vote.title: To authorize the Director of the Department of Finance and Management to modify the professional services contract with Stone Environmental Engineering and Science Inc. (PO340688) to extend the period of the agreement through March 31, 2023; and to authorize the Director of Finance to enter into a new contract with Stone Environmental Engineering and Science Inc.; to authorize the expenditure of Department of Finance and Management - Grants Management Administration funds in the amount of $57,000.00 (Fund 2248); and to declare an emergency. ($57,000.00)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
